abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Social Welfare
            Development Project for Croatia is to strengthen the quality
            of social services and improve administration, planning and
            policy making of the social welfare system. The extension is
            necessary to provide sufficient time to deliver and install
            the Information Technology (IT) equipment (US$2.1 million)
            and install LAN cabling network (US$0.4 million) in the
            social welfare institutions throughout Croatia. The national
            roll-out of the new social welfare management information
            system is a complex process that requires full
            implementation of three separate IT hardware and software
            contracts and installation of LAN cabling network, as well
            as their functional integration at the national level. Due
            to the delay in the procurement process, implementation of
            one of the IT hardware contracts will require additional
            three months to complete, and given the other contracts for
            supply and installation of hardware and software are
            functionally connected with the hardware procured under the
            contract in question, additional time is required for their
            full integration into one system. This all is expected to be
            achieved by March 31, 2011.
